content.text:
# List of awards and honours received by Gustavo Petro

Gustavo Petro, the 34th president of Colombia, has received numerous honors in recognition of his career in politics. These include:
National honors
{| class="wikitable" style="width:65%;"
! style="width:20%;"| Country
! style="width:20%;"| Date
! style="width:55%;"| Decoration
! style="width:5%;"| Post-nominal letters
|-
|  || 5 August 2022 || Order of Boyacá || ODB
|-
|  || 5 August 2022 || Order of San Carlos || OSC
|-
|  || 5 August 2022 || National Order of Merit || ODM
|-
|  || 5 August 2022 || Order of Merit Colonel Guillermo Fergusson || OGF
|}
Foreign honors
{| class="wikitable" style="width:65%;"
! style="width:20%;"| Country
! style="width:20%;"| Date
! style="width:55%;"| Decoration
! style="width:5%;"| Post-nominal letters
|-
|  || 3 May 2023 || Order of Isabella the Catholic (1st Class) ||CYC
|-
|  || 3 June 2024 || Grand Collar of the State of Palestine
|
|}
Scholastic
; Chancellor, visitor, governor, rector and fellowships
{| class="wikitable" style="width:100%;"
! style="width:20%;"| Location
! style="width:20%;"| Date
! style="width:40%;"| School
! style="width:20%;"| Position
|-
|  || 18 November 2018 || National University of Lanús || Honnorary professor
|-
|  || 31 March 2023 || University of Atlántico || Honoris Causa
|-
|  || 31 March 2023 || University of Cartagena || Honoris Causa
|-
|  || 31 March 2023 || Popular University of Cesar || Honoris Causa
|-
|  || 31 March 2023 || University of Córdoba || Honoris Causa
|-
|  || 31 March 2023 || University of La Guajira || Honoris Causa
|-
|  || 31 March 2023 || University of Magdalena || Honoris Causa
|-
|  || 31 March 2023 || University of Sucre || Honoris Causa
|-
|  || 28 August 2023 || University for Peace || Honoris Causa
|}
